Aha, here it is:
"Exiting with error code (instead of crashing) because of whole-program memory leaks"

I've updated the script to set heapchecker's exit code to 0.
Now we report an error only if we have unsuppressed leaks or the program returned 1 for a reason not related to leak checking.

subject: Make heapchecker return the program exit code if the analysis was successful.
